headline.main: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery
headline.print_headline: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery

lead_paragraph: He once was New Jersey's highest ranking law enforcement official, a mentor to Republican Gov. Chris Christie and the head of one of the nation's most powerful transportation agencies. On Monday, David Samson's next title could be far less glamorous — federal inmate.
